main event: A bright object was observed approaching from the west before disappearing behind trees in Madeira, Ohio.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately half an hour., The object was described as black., It was reported by a civilian., The sighting occurred shortly after a press release about a related incident., The reporting individual noted seeing the object at 10:15 PM.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: A civilian who traced the object and noticed news coverage of a similar incident.
